Title: Tora! Tora! Tora!
Writer: Larry Forrester (screenplay), Hideo Oguni (screenplay), Ryûzô Kikushima (screenplay), Gordon W. Prange (based on "Tora! Tora! Tora!"), Ladislas Farago (based on "The Broken Seal")
Actors: Martin Balsam, Sô Yamamura, Jason Robards, Joseph Cotten
Director: Richard Fleischer, Kinji Fukasaku, Toshio Masuda
Plot: In 1941, following months of economic embargo, Japan prepares to open its war against the United States with a preventive strike on the US naval base at Pearl Harbor.
